value:
Even dressed up like a rabbit, Fir's
ready to cross swords with anyone!
That's my girl! Gahaha!

When I was younger, I just wanted to
be the strongest. Now I wish for
nothing but my daughter's happiness.

I'm wearing this to match Fir! But
we don't match as well as I hoped.

So long winter, hello spring! It's time
to get stronger and aim for the top
all over again! Yaahhh!

If ANY creep tries to bother Fir,
they'll face the Bartre-hammer!
Even during the spring festival!

Gahaha! Spring is here! I wanted
to extend warm wishes
from $Nf!

Oh YEAH, that's the stuff.
I'm flourishing with power!
The festival's just getting started!

Ugh... Maybe this costume is too
tight for someone with big muscles?

New season means new POWER!
I'm just brimming with energy!

The name's Bartre and I'm a fighter.
Let's celebrate being all decked out
in spring festival gear! Gahaha!

So this spring festival you got here
in Askr... I like it!$k$pEveryone's gathered to revel
in the coming of springtime.
Why, nothing could be better!$k$pFir's having fun too. I can't
remember the last time she
smiled that big. Ahhhh.$k$pI'll do whatever it takes to keep that
grin on her face. Break down
anything that stands in my way!$k$pC'mon, $Nu!$k$pThe celebration isn't over yet!
Let's enjoy ourselves! Gahaha!
むん！
How's that!
ぐあっ！
How careless...!
Spring is here!
Wake up!
Spring's...sprung!
Leapin' smash!
Fir, forgive me...
Hmm...
I'm Bartre! All dressed up for the spring festival, I am!
Wanna touch? No need to be shy. Go for it! Give 'em a squeeze!
Is it a little weird that my outfit matches my daughter's? *heh* Well, I like it!
Come on, everybody! Spring is here! Let's celebrate!
My wife and I used to travel across the countryside and train together... Whenever I see rabbits, I think about those days.
Me and Fir, all gussied up. Wish Karla could see us...
Dressing up together really brings everybody closer, doesn't it?
You got it!
Colder!
That's the way!
